name: A Lost Light
description:
A Lost Light is a short 2D horror game inspired by RPG maker horror games. You play as a small willow-wisp that got lost inside a forest. In order to escape, solve the riddles and burn the totems. And you are not alone there...

Requierements:

Windows 10
3 GB storage space

Hi, I am a german game design student and this is my third game. If you purchased and played the game, I would appreciate some feedback :D Thank you so much!

instagram: @_sina_hofmann
ArtStation: https://www.artstation.com/magie_sina
